activities:
Marketing Software Company ("MSC") is as a Data Processor.  MSC is not a Data Comptroller ("DC")(see below).  
As a Data Processor, MSC receives data that is sent to it by DCs.  As a Data Processor, MSC prepares the data for marketing campaigns according to specific instructions given by DCs.  At the completion of a DC's project, MSC sends the prepared file back to the DC or the DC's agent.  MSC will retain the initial files, working files and output files for 90-days.  At 90-days, MSC will erase DC files and back-up files unless the DC instructs MSC otherwise.  MSC does not convert, process or forward data without DC instruction.  MSC does not derive ownership, or ownership responsibilities, in the course or manipulating DC data. 
(Data Comptrollers are individuals or companies that compile, maintain and manage personal data.)
